title: India 's petroleum imports by value 2010 to 2019
yAxis: Import value in billion Indian rupees
summary: This bar chart has 9 columns on the x axis representing Years, and Import value in billion Indian rupees in each Years on the y axis.
The Import value in billion Indian rupees is appeared to be the highest at Years FY 2014 and lowest at Years FY 2011.
The difference of Import value in billion Indian rupees between the highest and lowest Years is 5156.03.
min_summary: This bar chart has 9 columns on the x axis representing Years, and Import value in billion Indian rupees in each Years on the y axis.
Years FY 2014 has the highest Import value in billion Indian rupees and FY 2011 has the lowest Import value in billion Indian rupees.
mid_summary: This bar chart has 9 columns on the x axis representing Years, and Import value in billion Indian rupees in each Years on the y axis.
The Import value in billion Indian rupees is appeared to be the highest at Years FY 2014 and lowest at Years FY 2011.
The difference of Import value in billion Indian rupees between the highest and lowest Years is 5156.03.
max_summary: This bar chart has 9 columns on the x axis representing Years, and Import value in billion Indian rupees in each Years on the y axis.
The maximum Import value in billion Indian rupees 9978.85 is found at Years FY 2014 and the minimum is found at FY 2011 where Years is 4822.82.
Years FY 2019 has the second highest value for Import value in billion Indian rupees.
The Import value in billion Indian rupees of Years FY 2011 is 2.07% smaller than the maximum value at FY 2014.
Import value in billion Indian rupees at Years FY 2014 is 9978.85 , second place is FY 2019 at 9860.2, and thirdly is FY 2013 at 8918.71.
The Import value in billion Indian rupees has decreased over the past 9 Yearss.
The Years FY 2014 has 1.33 times more Import value in billion Indian rupees than average.
The Import value in billion Indian rupees is 67680.47 if we add up values of all Yearss.
